description:
Learn how to create Metatrader 4 expert advisors (robots) without having to know any programming language. Once completed you should be able to convert any technical Forex strategy into an expert advisor very quickly.

  • Develop and create your own trading strategies.
  • Provide trading signals with your trading strategy.
  • Sell your trading strategy as a Forex robot.
  • Provide services as a programmer creating expert advisors for other traders.

In this video course you will be able to follow along with me as I show you step by step how to add:

  • ATR trailing stops
  • Time based trading conditions
  • Add complex conditions to your EA within minutes
  • And more!

I look forward to seeing you on the inside!
title: How To Create Forex Robots - No Programming Required!
